original_text: They make plans to cause trouble, so that evil things happen. Lies are what come out from inside them.’ They make plans to cause trouble,
korean_text: 그들은 재난을 잉태하고 죄악을 낳으며 그들의 뱃속에 속임을 준비하느니라

sentences.original_text: They make plans to cause trouble
Lies are what come out from inside them
They make plans to cause trouble
